promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute strong monkey steel-type pokemon holding a ornate shield. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sandguardis, a a chibi cute strong monkey steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Triple Nose. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "steel" or "Sandguardis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, monkey-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This lively primate, known as the Iron-Arm Ape, rules desert habitats with its Triple Nose ability. Amidst sandstorms, it's unbeatable!
